subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The American Ted Ligety, who has been the most outspoken critic of a requirement to use new, straighter skis, used them to great effect, winning the first giant slalom of the World Cup season on Sunday.
snippet: The American Ted Ligety, who has been the most outspoken critic of a requirement to use new, straighter skis, used them to great effect, winning the first giant slalom of the World Cup season on Sunday.
